about_the_game:
Get ready for an epic journey in search of the ultimate prize: the best hat ever! Think you're up to the challenge?

Embark on a journey inspired by classic gaming challenges, where every victory feels like a triumph.

Take on the role of an adorable kitten on an epic quest to find the hat of dreams. Navigate through vibrant yet perilous worlds, brimming with cunning traps, cleverly hidden secrets, and bonus levels.


Key Features:

🎯 Tough Challenges: This game isn't for the faint-hearted! Every jump and dodge needs to be spot-on to conquer the trials ahead.

🔍 Discover Secrets: Uncover hidden treasures, unlock secret passages, and explore meticulously crafted bonus levels that offer unique challenges and rewards.

🎩 Fabulous Hat Collection: Seek out and collect a variety of fabulous hats scattered throughout the game.

🪤 Crafty Traps: Watch out for the tricky traps lurking around every corner! From sneaky spikes to mind-bending platforms, each level tests your reflexes and smarts.

🎵 Awesome Music: Immerse yourself in the game's world with a charming, energetic soundtrack that sets the perfect mood for your adventure.

name: MeowFall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: MeowFall is a charming 2D platformer in pixel art style. Take control of an adorable cat, overcome obstacles and uncover the secrets. Are you ready for an adventure to find the best hat ever?
